options.content:
## SLO Windows

All SLO below are displayed with the following time windows:
- Instant (based on the scrape interval of Prometheus)
- 1 hour
- 1 day

## Availability SLO

${slo}% of requests should succeed, i.e. receive a response with a status different from 5xx

## Latency SLO

${latency_slo_percent}% of successful requests (i.e that received a response with a 2xx status) should receive a response in ${latency_slo} ms or less

targets.expr: ${latency_slo_sec}
${latency_slo_percent} / 100
${latency_slo_percent} / 100
${latency_slo_percent} / 100
